attributes.action: Change the law to give employees 14 days paid Bereavement leave
attributes.additional_details: Because employers do not allow people the chance to grieve over the loss of loved one without penalising them in some way, a law need to a put in place so this doesn’t happen, as this can have a profound impact on mental health issues.
attributes.background:
I wish the government to acknowledge that, everyone deals with the death in different ways. 

To acknowledge the fact ,the guidelines for such situation is ignoring the needs of individuals.

I would like the government make it law that every employee has at least 14 days paid bereavement leave.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Introduce statutory paid bereavement leave for loss of family or close friends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572978
